data.actual_result: The bottom bar stays gray (meaning it's unfocused) and any text you tried to type doesn't appear
data.expected_result: The text should appear just how you typed it and the bottom bar is blurple to indicate it's focused (What happened on 7.9.6 and older)
data.short_description: [Android 9 & GBoard specific] Menus which open the keyboard don't auto-focus the text box
data.steps_to_repro: - Update to atleast 7.9.7 - Open a menu which also automatically opens the keyboard (the Search menu, for example) - Try to type something
